title: PBE Account disabled !?
body:
I saw the warwick update on live , and when i want to log in on pbe account to test him , booom , PBE account currently disabled !
What is happening !? I have this account since 2 years

replies.body: Is this a really old PBE account (2013 era) or a newer PBE account? Older PBE accounts were disabled when we moved over to the new system. I can look into this if you can provide the Summoner Name of your PBE account.

This also happened to me; I'm pretty sure my account isn't from 2013, and the PBE status says "Get to testing!" but it's disabled
My PBE username is the same.
Did my account just get cycled out? I was confused because of the PBE signup status not telling me what's going on

I took a look at your PBE account in our system and it seems we'll need you to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in order to sort your issues out. One of our specialists will reach back out to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi, I understand this is super late but please help me out as my PBE account is saying it's disabled too! It's after 2013, It just says to contact Riot support but I can't log on with it, it just says those details aren't found :( The username is **[REDACTED]**.

Would I put that under technical issues or account recovery?
EDIT: Ah, just occurred to me that it should probably not be in account recovery, but I already submitted the ticket lmao
This also happen to me, the account is new. It is about 2 month.
The same thing happened to me after the change. I had the account in early season 6, and i thought it was just a mistake, soon to be fixed. If you could fix this i would be very appreciative.

Please help my acct isn't really old but I would appreciate if someone could fix this problem please and thank you!
My account username is epicair21
My account is telling This account is currently disabled please contact our support to recover the account           how to resolve if you do not log in
Same thing here, just wanted to log in today and it told me that its disabled
ït also happened to me and i dont believe it is that old.username is bass2play and summoner name is ALG SPECTROWATCH pls fix it.
My PBE Account is also disabled, i had it after 2013 and my username is ZWzzuperZ, help would be appreciated
help my acc is from 2017 or 2016 and it says its disabled and i cant login to pbe page (pbe boards)
Help! It says my pbe account is currently disabled? What does that mean?? My ign is K I N J A Z for pbe. I was on a few weeks ago but not its disabled.{{champion:122}}

Same for me my acc got disabled and i have it from like 2 months or something my ign is Dutzanu Power can somebody help me?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Same thing here went on to go play URF and it said my account was disabled. I would like some help if there is, Thank You.
same with me.. not sure when the account was created tho :/ same name as this acc
It happened to me too can you also help me?
my account got disabled too，I did nothing to my pbe account, just didn't log in to that account for 5 days. my summoners name is Emilia is my waifu, can u fix this?
